saf.core.ui.dock

Class DefaultDockingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • saf.core.ui.event.DockableFrameAdapter
      • saf.core.ui.dock.DefaultDockingManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DockingManager, DockableFrameListener

    public class DefaultDockingManager
extends DockableFrameAdapter
implements DockingManager
    Default implementation of a DockingManager that uses docking frames docking framework.
    Author:
    Nick Collier

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface saf.core.ui.dock.DockingManager

        Creates a DockingManager from the specified GUIBarManager, viewport and list of perspectives.
        Parameters:
        barManager - the bar manager used by this DockingManager
        dockingControl - the CControl used by this DockingManager
        perspectives - the list of perspectives managed by this DockingManager

    • Method Detail

      • dock

        public void dock(DockableFrame dockable,
        DockableFrame target)
        Attempts to dock the specified dockable to the target, stacking the dockable on top of the target. This will do nothing if the target is minimized or the dockable has not been added to a group.
        Specified by:
        dock in interface DockingManager
        Parameters:
        dockable - the dockable to dock
        target - the target to dock to

      • dock

        public void dock(DockableFrame dockable,
        DockableFrame relativeTo,
        Location location,
        float fillPercent)
        Attempts to dock the specified dockable in some location relative to another dockable. This will not work if relativeTo is minimized or maximized, or if the dockable hasn't been added to a group yet.
        Specified by:
        dock in interface DockingManager
        Parameters:
        dockable - the dockable to dock
        relativeTo - the dockable to dock relative to
        location - the relative location
        fillPercent - the fill percent that the dockable should take up

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        perspectiveID - the id of the perspective to add the dockable frame to
        groupID - the id of the group to add the dockable frame to
        dockable - the dockable frame to add

      • createDockable

        public DockableFrame createDockable(java.lang.String id,
                           javax.swing.JComponent comp)
        Creates a Dockable frame with the specified id containing the specified component. This only creates the dockable frame. To add a created dockable frame into a window use the addDockableToGroup method.
        Specified by:
        createDockable in interface DockingManager
        Parameters:
        id - the id that uniquely identifies the created Dockable frame
        comp - the component displayed by the dockable frame
        Returns:
        the created dockable frame
        See Also:
        addDockableToGroup(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, saf.core.ui.dock.DockableFrame)

      • createDockable

        public DockableFrame createDockable(java.lang.String id,
                           javax.swing.JComponent comp,
                           DockingManager.MinimizeLocation hideLocation)
        Creates a dockable frame with the specified id, hide location and containing the specified component. This only creates the dockable frame. To add a created dockable frame into a window use the addDockableToGroup method.

        Specified by:
        createDockable in interface DockingManager
        Parameters:
        id - the id that uniquely identifies the created Dockable frame
        comp - the component displayed by the dockable frame
        hideLocation - the location where the dockable frame is minimized to
        Returns:
        the created dockable frame

      • createDockable

        public DockableFrame createDockable(java.lang.String id,
                           javax.swing.JComponent comp,
                           DockingManager.MinimizeLocation location,
                           int dockableControls)
        Creates a dockable frame with the specified id, hide location, window controls and containing the specified component. This only creates the dockable frame. To add a created dockable frame into a window use the addDockableToGroup method.

        The dockable frame controls are:

        • DockingManager.CLOSE
        • DockingManager.HIDE
        • DockingManager.MAXIMIZE
        • DockingManager.FLOAT
        These can be logically or'ed together.
        Specified by:
        createDockable in interface DockingManager
        Parameters:
        id - the id that uniquely identifies the created Dockable frame
        comp - the component displayed by the dockable frame
        location - the location where the dockable frame is minimized to
        dockableControls - specifies what controls (close, maximize, float etc.) are displayed on the dockable frame's title bar
        Returns:
        the created dockable frame
